headline: The Campbell’s Company Appoints Senior Leaders to Accelerate Growth
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., April 15, 2025--The Campbell’s Company (NASDAQ:CPB) today announced senior management changes to accelerate progress against its strategic plan and drive continued growth.
